page.title: 04St. John's Village.
page.content:
About 60 years ago there were only a dozen or so{dwellings}clustered around the{Church}and{Parish Hall.}Now there are about 120 houses in two main sections of the village.
The first section, built in the early 1970's is known as{"Ville des Chenes." This means{"Village of the Oaks."}The second section, constructed in 1983/4 is known as{"Le Pre des Chenes,"}which means{"The Oak Meadow."
A third section of the village {development}is being built at the time of this survey (1985).
The village has a small{shopping {precinct}which consists of a general store/post office, chemist, butcher, bank, hairdresser, confectioner and video centre.
